raw_text: Skip to content Issue 42 – March 2010 Cover Art Retro Robots Georgi Markov is a 31-year-old freelance illustrator and concept artist that lives in a small upland village in Bulgaria. He is experienced in variety of applications and has done book illustrations, cover art, game posters, and character design. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Issue 42 – March 2010
Cover Art
Retro Robots
Georgi Markov is a 31-year-old freelance illustrator and concept artist that lives in a small upland village in Bulgaria. He is experienced in variety of applications and has done book illustrations, cover art, game posters, and character design.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
